Header: West Troops Assist Douse Sudden Fire at Braybrooke Place
Content: Two Officers and 35 Other Ranks of the 14 Division and 11 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment (VIR) under command to the Security Force Headquarters - West (SFHQ-West) rushed to assist control of a sudden fire that erupted in a building under construction at Braybrooke Place, Colombo 2 this afternoon (7). Troops assisting Fire Fighters of the Colombo Municipal Council doused the fire within a couple of hours. Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage, Commander, Security Forces - West (SF-West) has instructed the General Officer Commanding (GOC) to take necessary steps in this regard.
